definition: to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: As a matter of fact, no pretended and natural love should be perpetual.
sentences.chinese: 其實，不做作，流於自然的愛情纔是細水長流的。

sentences.english: The traditional view is that Regaining Educational Right of the National governments in Nanjing is ostensible.

sentences.english: At many companies, the annual meeting is a waste of time because exhibitionists turn it into a sideshow.
sentences.chinese: 在許多公司股東會只是浪費時間，因爲大多流於形式。

sentences.english: But the present jury system of our country has become a mere formality because of all kinds of reasons.
sentences.chinese: 但由於各種原因，當前我國陪審制度已基本流於形式。

sentences.english: Anything goes as long as it relates to Christmas and is not too preachy .
sentences.chinese: 只要和聖誕節有關，而且不會流於說教的節目都可以。

sentences.english: But rivers flow tirelessly to the sea, never ending in exhaustion.
sentences.chinese: 而江水汲汲流於海，終弗竭也。

sentences.english: Other people drink too much alcohol.
sentences.chinese: 也有其他人很輕易就流於酗酒。

sentences.english: Perhaps he knew that Archippus had a tendency to settle down in comfort and to take things easy.
sentences.chinese: 也許他知道亞基布容易流於安逸和處事輕忽。

sentences.english: Empty fireworks in the sky don't mean anything.
sentences.chinese: 流於空乏的煙火一點意思都沒有。

sentences.english: In this way, the so-called assets declaration system also too formalistic doctrine.

sentences.english: When it comes to character depicting, his prose dips into the ordinary.
sentences.chinese: 當涉筆於人物描寫時，他的文章就流於平庸了。
